title: Highly conductive flat grains of cesium lead bromide perovskite via additive engineering with methylammonium bromide
content:

Perovskite solar cells made of inorganic cesium lead bromide (CsPbBr3) have displayed unusually high open-circuit potentials. Yet, the photovoltage efficiency is still lagging behind that of iodide-based halide perovskites. In...
